properties.name: spring.zipkin.kafka.topic
properties.description: Name of the Kafka topic where spans should be sent to Zipkin.

properties.name: spring.zipkin.rabbitmq.queue
properties.description: Name of the RabbitMQ queue where spans should be sent to Zipkin.

properties.name: spring.zipkin.rabbitmq.addresses
properties.description: Addresses of the RabbitMQ brokers used to send spans to Zipkin

properties.name: spring.zipkin.activemq.queue
properties.description: Name of the ActiveMQ queue where spans should be sent to Zipkin.

properties.name: spring.zipkin.activemq.message-max-bytes
properties.description: Maximum number of bytes for a given message with spans sent to Zipkin over ActiveMQ.

properties.name: spring.sleuth.function.enabled
properties.description: Enable instrumenting of Spring Cloud Function and Spring Cloud Function based projects (e.g. Spring Cloud Stream).

properties.name: spring.sleuth.async.enabled
properties.description: Enable instrumenting async related components so that the tracing information is passed between threads.

properties.name: spring.sleuth.feign.enabled
properties.description: Enable span information propagation when using Feign.

properties.name: spring.sleuth.feign.processor.enabled
properties.description: Enable post processor that wraps Feign Context in its tracing representations.

properties.name: spring.sleuth.grpc.enabled
properties.description: Enable span information propagation when using GRPC.

properties.name: spring.sleuth.deployer.status-poll-delay
properties.description: Default poll delay to retrieve the deployed application status.

properties.name: spring.sleuth.config.server.enabled
properties.description: Enable Spring Cloud Config Server instrumentation.
